comment:
Variables:
- x: number of carrier pigeons used
- y: number of owls used

Constraints:
- Number of treats constraint: 3x + 5y \leq 1000
- Percentage of owls constraint: y \leq 0.4(x + y)
- Minimum carrier pigeons constraint: x \geq 20
- Non-negativity constraint: x, y \geq 0

Objective:
- Maximize Z = 2x + 5y
